definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Clean up any beads of mercury by using an index card and plastic dustpan.
sentences.chinese: 用撲索引卡和塑料簸箕清理水銀珠子。

sentences.english: Mercury is an exception to the rule that metals are solid at room temperature.
sentences.chinese: 水銀是金屬在室溫內爲固體這條規則的例外。

sentences.english: Heavy as iron is, it will float in mercury .
sentences.chinese: 儘管鐵重，但它能浮在水銀上。

sentences.english: One group ate food with 0.3 parts per million (ppm) methylmercury, which most U.
sentences.chinese: 第一組喫的食物中，甲基水銀含量是千萬分之三。

sentences.english: Lorz's moment in the limelight did not last very long.
sentences.chinese: 然而洛爾斯在水銀燈下的輝煌並沒有持續多長時間。

sentences.english: Mercury was used in the form of ointments, oral administration, and vapor baths.
sentences.chinese: 水銀以軟膏，口頭的管理，並且蒸汽洗澡形式被使用。

sentences.english: Mercury has a much greater density than water .
sentences.chinese: 水銀的密度比水大得多。

sentences.english: The tube is placed open end in a cistern partially filled with mercury.
sentences.chinese: 管子以開口一端插入部分裝有水銀的槽內。

sentences.english: Package materials securely and label as "Mercury-Contaminated.
sentences.chinese: 把東西妥善地打包並標上“被水銀污染”。

sentences.english: And the result came to be the Mercury Mystique and later on became the Mercury Cougar.
sentences.chinese: 和結果後來被水銀的神祕感，後來就成了汞美洲獅。

sentences.english: They then vaporise the mercury using a blowtorch, leaving gold behind.
sentences.chinese: 之後，他們用噴燈蒸發水銀，最終提取黃金。

sentences.english: In nearby areas, gold mining has released mercury into the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 而在附近的地方，淘金者們向空氣和水源還排放水銀。

sentences.english: The height of the mercury column AB will vary according to the air pressure.
sentences.chinese: 水銀柱AB之間的高度會隨氣壓而改變。

sentences.english: The ultrasonic interference mercury manometer of NBS represents the highest level in the world.
sentences.chinese: NBS超聲干涉儀水銀壓力計，爲國際最高水平。

sentences.english: Rissa was the first Alchemist to perfect the art of converting useless soft metals into mercury.
sentences.chinese: 瑞薩是第一個能將無用金屬轉化成水銀的鍊金術士。

sentences.english: The bourdon-type pressure gauge is more convenient for most purposes than a liquid manometer.
sentences.chinese: 帶軟管的杯式壓力計是一種水銀作用式壓力計。
